About

I’m Anojan Sivaranjan and I’m a product designer in Colombo, Sri Lanka.

Currently I’m helping rebuild property management in Australia through designing internal operations tool, mobile apps and design system at :Different. Before :Different, I was a designer at Esplorio, Amplifyn and Thiken where I worked on multiple projects on various different platforms.

You can reach me on Twitter, LinkedIn or via sanojan11@gmail.com
